headline: Howmet Aerospace Inc. (HWM) Capitalizing on Strong Demand in Spare Parts Business
summary: Howmet Aerospace Inc. (NYSE:HWM) is one of the best growth stocks to buy and hold forever. On September 4 at the Jefferies Mining and Industrials Conference 2025, the company reiterated its underlying growth despite industry-wide destocking and supply chain challenges. According to CEO John Plant, the company is experiencing healthy growth in its spares business, […]
